Hi Misty=A0=A0=A0 Maybe I missed it but can u tell me what radio, am or fm,=
 and radio frequency you tuned to=A0more or less?=A0 Probably the best stat=
ions I can get here are the non-stations.=A0 lol=A0 ron

--- On Sat, 8/30/0=
8, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:

From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea=
@...>
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] DRV - Direct Radio Voice recordings
To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Saturday, August 30, 2008, 8:29 PM






I ne=
ver had alot of luck with it either. I tried it before with group many time=
s but it was so distant and never clear or just nothing at all. But every n=
ow and then when I do a manual sweep I notice while I sit on dead air that =
sometimes thats where the best evp would come thru so I started to make it =
a habit that when I start and stop my sweep sessions its off station in the=
 dead zone. I was doing a sweep the other night and they came thru real cle=
ar there with messages for my friend so I thought hmmm lets try just DRV an=
d no sweeping and see if they can connect or if I can hear them. I heard no=
thing live just buzzing noise or what sounds like air/waves/whooshing now a=
nd then. So its not like some get where they hear it loud and clear and hav=
e conversations back and forth. At least not yet.

Maybe a few adjustments =
could change that I dont know. I never know why some days they are clearer =
than others.

Misty

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;">Hi Misty    Maybe I missed it but can u tell me what radio, am or fm, and radio frequency you tuned to more or less?  Probably the best stations I can get here are the non-stations.  lol  ron<BR><BR>--- On <B>Sat, 8/30/08, Misty Dawn <I><bulletbabea@...></I></B> wrote:<BR>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...><BR>Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] DRV - Direct Radio Voice recordings<BR>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Saturday, August 30, 2008, 8:29 PM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv88778914>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<DIV>I never had alot of luck with it either. I tried it before with group many times but it was so distant and never clear or just nothing at all. But every now and then when I do a manual sweep I notice while I sit on dead air that sometimes thats where the best evp would come thru so I started to make it a habit that when I start and stop my sweep sessions its off station in the dead zone. I was doing a sweep the other night and they came thru real clear there with messages for my friend so I thought hmmm lets try just DRV and no sweeping and see if they can connect or if I can hear them. I heard nothing live just buzzing noise or what sounds like air/waves/whooshing now and then. So its not like some get where they hear it loud and clear and have conversations back and forth. At least not yet.<BR><BR>Maybe a few adjustments could change that I dont know. I never know why some days they are clearer than others.<BR><BR>Misty<BR><BR>--- On Sat, 8/30/08,
